title: The Unseen Triumphs of Romeo Young
summary: Romeo Young, a 47-year-old instructor by day, discovers his hidden powers and faces his fears throughout a week filled with unexpected challenges and heroic deeds.
summaryGerman: Romeo Young, ein 47-jähriger Lehrer tagsüber, entdeckt seine verborgenen Kräfte und stellt sich im Laufe einer Woche voller unerwarteter Herausforderungen und heldenhafter Taten seinen Ängsten.
summaryDutch: Romeo Young, overdag een 47-jarige instructeur, ontdekt zijn verborgen krachten en gaat zijn angsten te lijf gedurende een week vol onverwachte uitdagingen en heldendaden.
summaryFrench: Romeo Young, un instructeur de 47 ans le jour, découvre ses pouvoirs cachés et affronte ses peurs tout au long d'une semaine remplie de défis inattendus et d'actes héroïques.

story.text: At a local sports field, while coaching, Romeo accidentally discovers his ability to control objects with his mind, throwing a soccer ball across the field without touching it.
Inspired by his new abilities, Romeo rescues a cat stuck high in a tree, feeling newfound courage and the joy of helping.
Romeo confronts a band of local thieves; using his telekinesis, he disarms them and waits for the police, feeling victorious.
Haunted by doubts about his capability and the implications of his powers, Romeo wanders the city at night, pondering his future.
Meeting with a retired superhero who offers guidance, Romeo feels energized and ready to embrace his role as a protector of his city.
During a local marathon, a sudden bridge collapse threatens runners. Romeo swiftly uses his power to avert disaster, saving many lives.
Reflecting on his week, Romeo spends a peaceful day with his family, embracing his dual life and feeling at peace with his responsibilities.

ending: And so Romeo Young found his purpose, not just in the daylight of coaching, but in the shadows where heroes are truly made.
moral: Even unasked, great responsibility comes with great power.
